<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/restoreversion"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Restores a file version specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"The file ID of the restore version.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}},{"name":"version","in":"query","description":"The file version of the restore.","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1234}},{"name":"url","in":"query","description":"The file version URL of the restore.","schema":{"type":"string","example":"some text"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
